Uses of Class
model.Day

  • Packages that use Day 
    Package Description
    controller  
    model  

    • Uses of Day in controller

      Methods in controller that return Day 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Day[] CalendarController.getDays(java.lang.String monthName)
      Takes in a year and a month and returns the array of Day objects for that month
      Methods in controller with parameters of type Day 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean CalendarController.addEvent(Day day, java.lang.String label, int sH, int sM, int eH, int eM, java.lang.String notes, java.lang.String loc, java.lang.String color)
      Adds an event to the given day object
      void CalendarController.removeEvent(Day day, Event event)
      This method removes the first instance of the event with the passed in label within the events list of the day

    • Uses of Day in model

      Methods in model that return Day 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Day Event.getDay()
      Returns the Day object that the event is attributed to
      Day Week.getDay(int dayNum)
      This method takes in a dayNum which is the day of the week and returns the Day object at the week's Day for that int
      Day Month.getDay(int dayNum)
      Returns the Day object at the dayNum inputed (the date)
      Day[] Week.getDays()
      This method returns the array of Day objects for the week
      Day[] Month.getDays()
      Returns the day array of the month
      Methods in model with parameters of type Day 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Event.setDay(Day day)
      Sets the Day object of the event to the passed in day
      void Month.setDay(Day day, int dayNum)
      Sets the Day object at the given dayNum in the array to the Day object that is passed in.
      void Week.setDay(int dayNum, Day day)
      This method sets the Week's day of the week to the inputed Day
      void Week.setDays(Day[] days)
      This method sets the Day array of the Week to the inputed Day array
      Constructors in model with parameters of type Day 
      Constructor and Description
      Event(Day day, java.lang.String label, int sH, int sM, int eH, int eM, java.lang.String notes, java.lang.String loc, java.lang.String color)
      Constructor for the event object.
      Week(int weekNum, Day[] days)
      This constructor takes in the weekNum plus an array of Day objects that we can set as the Week's days
